title: ✦AVAILABLE FOR FAST APPROVER
description:
Located in Center City Philadelphia, Rittenhouse Square is an upscale neighborhood teeming with luxury retailers, independent boutique stores, art galleries, theaters, cafes, bars, and a wide variety of restaurants. At the neighborhood’s core sits Rittenhouse Square, a tree-filled one-square-block park that hosts numerous festivals, fairs, and farmers markets.
Rittenhouse Square, the park, is one of the five original squares city founder William Penn planned in the late 17th century. Today, it is Philadelphia’s most popular town square, serving as a gathering place and a tranquil reprieve from its bustling surroundings.
Rittenhouse Square, the neighborhood, offers plenty of luxury apartments available for rent in elegant high-rise buildings. Many amenities are situated within walking distance, while access to public transit makes getting around from Rittenhouse Square easy.

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.

The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! title: Welcome to (2712 W Oxford St) With 3/1.5, In-Unit Laundry, Pets OK!
description: Available Early-Mid September: Welcome to 2712 W Oxford St! This is a beautiful 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom single family home featuring a HUGE back patio, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, and great character throughout. You enter into the main living area with a straight-through floor plan for ultimate space. There are 2 windows at the front for sunlight and a full wall of paneled mirrors that flows back from your living room to your dining room. An adorable powder room is by the dining area for added convenience, and your contemporary kitchen is at the back equipped with cabinetry above & below, prep space, a gas range stove, and a large refrigerator with drink & ice dispenser. Continue upstairs on the fully carpeted 2nd level where a hallway branches off to your 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. The bedrooms are about the same size with ceiling fans, closet space, and windows. Your full bathroom is gorgeous, offering tile flooring, a lighted contemporary vanity, and a subway tiled shower / tub combo. Head outside to the ginormous back patio, providing more than enough space for patio furniture, gardening, and entertaining. There's a partially finished basement with your full sized washer & dryer, plus additional storage space. This fantastic home won't last long - CONTACT today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Brewery town neighborhood, surrounded by tons of green outdoor spaces, public transportation routes, trendy shops, and popular eateries. You'll be close to I-76, Route 13, and Kelly Drive for a quick and easy commute. Walk able to the Athletic Recreation Center, 30th & Jefferson Street Park, Lemon Hill, Schuylkill River Trail, and great hiking options in Fair mount Park. Check out local favorites like The Monkey & The Elephant, Cultivate Plant Store, Green Eggs Cafe, Holistic Jaw Food Store, Re bred, Crime and Punishment Brewing Co., Spot Gourmet Burgers, and more. Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and required security deposit. Water is included in the monthly rent. Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, and cable/internet.

title: $1362/MONTH - Chestnut Hill Stunner in an idyllic setting!! 4BD / 2BA
description: Chestnut Hill Stunner in an idyllic setting!! 5 minute walking distance to the quaint shops, cobblestone streets and restaurants of historic Chestnut Hill, lovingly known as “The Hill”. This exquisite home, on nearly 1/2 acre, has one of the largest inground pools in the area - 25 by 50 feet and it can now be yours! Situated on a quiet street, this deep private lot makes you feel as if you are in the country yet you are in close proximity to major thoroughfares and the city. This visually dazzling home boasts cedar shake roofing and a masonry exterior to create one of the most curb appealing properties in the area. Fully renovated and updated modern marvel boasts new flooring throughout, exquisite light fixtures, beautiful bathrooms and a gourmet kitchen with an open concept! Offering a gas Wolf Cooktop, instant hot water, stainless appliances, corian countertops and peninsula/island. Nearly $250,000 in upgrades throughout! As you walk into the home, your unobstructed view of the pool and lush landscaping greet you and you realize that this is an entertainers dream! One level living at its finest! All of this and Low Taxes too! As you enjoy the incredible light filled rooms with many custom touches you recognize you are in your very own retreat. Relax by the comforting gas fireplace in the family room on those cold nights or step outside to one of the most visually stunning yards, where the neighbors, for years, have admired the beautiful Southern Magnolia and Japanese Maple Trees and delightfully manicured greenery! The stone patio Zen Garden out in front of the house is a perfect place for your morning coffee or a good book! Absolutely Amazing! Back inside you notice the many architectural details including arched seating nooks, built in shelves to display your wonderful art objects and a full wall of french doors and windows for your very own visual framing of the pool area and backyard! From your living room, family room and dinning room area you pass through the bright sitting room as you continue to enjoy the same view. Enter your primary bedroom suite so large that you have a sitting area and dressing area along with double closets complete with organizing systems installed and you are also looking out onto the serene back yard. The fully renovated primary bath has sparkling tile floors and quartz countertops as well as a fully tiled shower and can be accessed by the pocket door by the sunroom or the main bedroom. There is also a cedar double linen/storage closet in this huge bathroom. A laundry room was added complete with display shelves and storage cabinets. This home boasts three more huge bedrooms, which have many uses besides sleeping areas-sitting/TV Room, an office or den. There is also a HUGE 66 x 25 fully floored attic area accessed by pull down steps in bedroom 4 that you can stand in. This attic can add 1625 Sq Ft of living space with a little creative configuring-steps can be added for easier access, walls can be dormered etc. A full hall bath with lighting under the sink area to display your inside garden and large cast iron tub complete the inside. This fully tiled /marble countertop with undermount sink bathroom is ethereal! There is a newly constructed raised parking driveway/area enough for 5 cars and access to 3 more spots off street out front! ☎ WE ARE OPEN and would love to show you around, please call to schedule your tour!  show contact info

This level also has a nice-sized laundry room (with new washer), along with the half-bathroom. Head up a few steps to the oversized living room, and see the light beam through the front windows, bringing a sense of cheerfulness to the property. The dining room (complete with a new chandelier), along with the kitchen to an extent, are open to the living room, making this a great place to entertain guests. Continue on upstairs and find the generously-sized primary bedroom, with en suite bathroom. This level also has three additional nice-sized bedrooms, a full bathroom (complete with a bathtub), and a linen closet. The unfinished basement space is an added bonus, and provides incredible storage. The interior of this property is great, but the exterior is an aspect that separates it from its competition. This corner lot is enormous and the fenced-in backyard has a deck that is accessed through the kitchen, and a lower patio that is accessed through the family room. This area provides a great space to either host guests or simply relax after a long day. For convenience, the patio is complete with a new retractable awning, helping to stay cool during your summer barbecues. The roof is five years old, and many of the window treatments throughout the property are new! Also, a new garage door will be added prior to settlement! Single homes in Pine Valley rarely come on the market, and when they do, they typically go rather quickly. I see no reason why this would be any different. title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Wood Floors, City View, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as November 25, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 to 2. There is so much to do in this area!
